title: Factors associated with poor adherence to medication in patients with diabetes and hypertension in Peru: findings from a pooled analysis of six years of population-based surveys
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 231

Author(s): Pablo M. Calderon-Ramirez, Edson Huamani-Merma, Mayu Gabriel Mirano-Ortiz-de-Orue, Daniel Fernandez-Guzman, Carlos J. Toro-Huamanchumo
